level.text: A pet grooming establishment may be permitted as a special exception if approved by the Board of Zoning Adjustment under ยง 3104, subject to the requirements of this section.
The pet grooming establishment shall be located and designed to create no objectionable condition to adjacent properties resulting from animal noise, odor, or waste.

All animal waste shall be placed in closed waste disposal containers and shall utilize a qualified waste disposal company to collect and dispose of all animal waste at least weekly. Odor shall be controlled by means of an air filtration system or an equivalently effective odor control system.
The pet grooming establishment shall not abut an existing residential use or Residence District.
External yards or other external facilities for the keeping of animals shall not be permitted.
The sale of pet supplies is permitted as an accessory use.
The Board may impose additional requirements as it deems necessary to protect nearby properties.
